<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300'>
  <!-- Tło - kość -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='130' fill='#e6e6e6' stroke='#d9d9d9' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Obrys zęba trzonowego -->
  <path d='M90 150 Q150 90 210 150 Q270 210 210 270 Q150 330 90 270 Q30 210 90 150' fill='#b3b3b3' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Kanały korzeniowe z wypełnieniem -->
  <circle cx='125' cy='175' r='15' fill='#dddddd' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='1' />
  <circle cx='175' cy='175' r='15' fill='#dddddd' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='1' />
  <circle cx='150' cy='125' r='15' fill='#b3b3b3' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Komora miazgi z wypełnieniem -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='30' fill='#cccccc' stroke='#b3b3b3' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Niewypełniony kanał dodatkowy -->
  <path d='M175 175 L200 210' fill='none' stroke='#dddddd' stroke-width='3' stroke-dasharray='4,2' />
  
  <!-- Zmiana okołowierzchołkowa -->
  <circle cx='185' cy='225' r='20' fill='#ffcccc' stroke='#ffb3b3' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8' />
</svg>

<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300'>
  <!-- Kość wyrostka zębodołowego -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='200' height='200' rx='20' fill='#e6e6e6' stroke='#d9d9d9' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Korona zęba -->
  <rect x='75' y='50' width='150' height='60' rx='10' fill='#e0e0e0' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Zębina - korzeń -->
  <rect x='95' y='110' width='110' height='140' rx='5' fill='#b3b3b3' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Kanał korzeniowy z wypełnieniem -->
  <rect x='125' y='110' width='50' height='120' rx='5' fill='#dddddd' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Rozgraniczenie korzeni -->
  <line x1='150' y1='110' x2='150' y2='250' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='1' stroke-dasharray='4,2' />
  
  <!-- Zmiana okołowierzchołkowa -->
  <ellipse cx='150' cy='265' rx='25' ry='15' fill='#ffcccc' stroke='#ffb3b3' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.8' />
</svg>

<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300'>
  <!-- Tło - kość -->
  <circle cx='150' cy='150' r='130' fill='#e6e6e6' stroke='#d9d9d9' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Obrys zęba trzonowego -->
  <path d='M90 90 Q150 50 210 90 Q270 150 210 210 Q150 270 90 210 Q30 150 90 90' fill='#b3b3b3' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Komora miazgi i kanały wypełnione -->
  <path d='M110 110 Q150 80 190 110 Q220 150 190 190 Q150 220 110 190 Q80 150 110 110' fill='#dddddd' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Obrzęk tkanek miękkich -->
  <path d='M90 150 L40 150' fill='none' stroke='#ff9999' stroke-width='8' stroke-linecap='round' />
  <ellipse cx='100' cy='180' rx='30' ry='20' fill='#ffb3b3' stroke='#ff9999' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5' />
</svg>

<svg viewBox='0 0 300 300'>
  <!-- Kość wyrostka zębodołowego -->
  <rect x='50' y='50' width='200' height='200' rx='20' fill='#e6e6e6' stroke='#d9d9d9' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Korona zęba -->
  <rect x='75' y='50' width='150' height='60' rx='10' fill='#e0e0e0' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Zębina - korzeń -->
  <rect x='95' y='110' width='110' height='140' rx='5' fill='#b3b3b3' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='2' />
  
  <!-- Kanały korzeniowe z wypełnieniem -->
  <rect x='105' y='110' width='90' height='110' rx='2' fill='#dddddd' stroke='#cccccc' stroke-width='1' />
  
  <!-- Obrzęk tkanek miękkich -->
  <path d='M120 80 L80 50' fill='none' stroke='#ff9999' stroke-width='8' stroke-linecap='round' />
  <ellipse cx='70' cy='40' rx='20' ry='15' fill='#ffb3b3' stroke='#ff9999' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.5' />
</svg>
